title: Welcome to FactQuest
subtitle: Test your knowledge with themed quizzes
description: FactQuest is a thematic quiz application where you can choose question categories and answer to earn points. Challenge yourself and compete with others!

quizCard.description: Choose from various categories and test your knowledge

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard

leaderboard.refreshInfo: This page updates every 30 seconds to show the latest scores
